name: Jollof Rice
description: A classic West African rice dish cooked with tomatoes and spices.
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Prepare sauce with tomatoes, onions, and spices. 3. Mix rice and sauce together. 4. Serve hot.

name: Fried Rice
description: A savory dish of rice stir-fried with vegetables and seasonings.
instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Stir-fry vegetables and protein of choice. 3. Add rice and soy sauce. 4. Mix and serve.

name: Yam and Egg Sauce
description: Boiled yam served with a delicious egg and tomato sauce.
instructions: 1. Boil yam until soft. 2. Prepare egg sauce with tomatoes, onions, and eggs. 3. Serve yam with egg sauce on top.

name: Pizza
description: A delicious baked flatbread typically topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings.
instructions: 1. Prepare dough and stretch into a flat shape. 2. Add tomato sauce, cheese, and toppings. 3. Bake in a hot oven until golden.

name: Burger
description: A savory sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.
instructions: 1. Cook the meat patty. 2. Toast the buns. 3. Assemble with lettuce, tomato, and sauce. 4. Serve with fries.

name: Potato Salad
description: A creamy and tangy salad made with boiled potatoes, mayonnaise, and seasonings.
instructions: 1. Boil potatoes and cut into cubes. 2. Mix with mayonnaise, mustard, and seasonings. 3. Chill before serving.

name: Stir-Fried Noodles
description: A flavorful dish of noodles stir-fried with vegetables and protein in a savory sauce.
instructions: 1. Cook noodles according to package instructions. 2. Stir-fry vegetables and protein. 3. Add noodles and soy sauce. 4. Mix and serve.
